title: Shirasuka, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRC, upper center
description: a long daimyo procession makes its way down a sloping hill, their heads just visible behind the tall grey hill; ocean view at center and shoreline punctuated with small trees, fishing nets, and low structures; several small boats clustered near center; a few large sails visible at the horizon; lightly pink sky
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
